Posts.Content: bandwoman1234 wrote: Last week was supposed to be my last week of rads. The accelerator broke down and I missed four days of treatment last week. The bad part was I only had four treatments left. Anyone else have this happen? The first day off felt like a gift and then day after day of postponed treatmentsÂ felt very disappointing. Hopefully it will be up and working next week. Has anyone had this happen to you for so many days? Hopefully it won't make a difference in my outcome. Bandwoman Dx 3/14/2014, IDC, Left, 1cm, Stage IA, Grade 1, 0/3 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2- Surgery 3/27/2014 Lumpectomy: Left; Lymph node removal: Left, Sentinel Radiation Therapy 5/13/2014 Whole-breast: Breast, Lymph nodes Hormonal Therapy 7/25/2014 Arimidex (anastrozole) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Radiation Machine Broke Down!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! bandwoman1234 bandwoman1234
